attributes.action: Bruce Keogh to work a week of night shifts
attributes.additional_details:
We challenge Bruce Keogh to work a week of night shifts in the NHS, to gain first-hand experience of front-line medicine out-of-hours services before he forces doctors and NHS staff to work 24/7 shift patterns.

The following rules would apply:

1) 4 consecutive night shifts from 8pm to 8am.
2) Consumption of food available only on site (i.e vending machines)
3) No rest breaks
4) Self-drive to and from workplace
